question: Which among the following is the unit of Insurance in National Agricultural Insurance Scheme (NAIS)?
explanation: National Agricultural Insurance Scheme (NAIS) was implemented with effect from Kharif 1999 to enlarge the coverage of risks of farmers and crops. The scheme operates on the basis of Area Approach and each participating State or UT is required to reach the level of Gram Panchayat as the unit area of insurance, in a period of three years.
